Uses of InstrumentedRobot in fr.upmc.dtgui.example.robot
 

Classes in fr.upmc.dtgui.example.robot that implement InstrumentedRobot
 class AnotherLittleRobot
          The class AnotherLittleRobot is just similar to the class LittleRobot but defines a robot with no energy information and which speed is constant and not controllable.
 class LittleRobot
          The class LittleRobot implements a simple simulated robot that evolves in a 2D environment.

Uses of InstrumentedRobot in fr.upmc.dtgui.gui
 

Methods in fr.upmc.dtgui.gui with parameters of type InstrumentedRobot
 void RobotTeleoperationBoard.connectRobot(InstrumentedRobot lr)
          connect a robot to the current teleoperation board when the robot becomes teleoperable (within the control radius of the hosting station).
abstract  RobotTeleoperationBoard TeleoperationGUI.createBoard(InstrumentedRobot lr)
          create the teleoperation board fort the robot lr.
abstract  SensorDataReceptorInterface TeleoperationGUI.createSensorDataReceptor(InstrumentedRobot lr, RobotTeleoperationBoard board)
          create the sensor data receptor thread for the robot lr and connects it to its teleoperation board.
 void TeleoperationGUI.detectRobot(InstrumentedRobot lr)
          makes a robot visible (but not yet controllable) from this teleoperation station when it enters its visibility area.
 void RobotTeleoperationBoard.disconnectRobot(InstrumentedRobot lr)
          disconnect a robot from the current teleoperation board when the robot is no longer teleoperable (not within the control radius of the hosting station).
 void TeleoperationGUI.makeControllable(InstrumentedRobot lr)
          make a robot controllable by this control station when it enters its control area.
 void TeleoperationGUI.makeUncontrollable(InstrumentedRobot lr)
          make a robot no longer controllable (but still visible) by this control station when it exits its control area.
 void RobotSelector.registerRobot(InstrumentedRobot lr)
           
 void TeleoperationGUI.selectRobot(InstrumentedRobot lr)
          Make a robot the currently controlled robot through this teleoperation station.
 void TeleoperationGUI.undetectRobot(InstrumentedRobot lr)
          makes a robot no longer visible from this teleoperation station when it exits its visibility area.
 void RobotSelector.unregisterRobot(InstrumentedRobot lr)
